document.full_text: a federal judge signaled that she would approve a settlement calling for wells fargo & co to pay $32 million to about 1,200 female brokers who claimed they were paid less than men and denied promotions because of their gender.
document.title: judge signals ok of wells fargo gender bias accord
lines_and_colors: a federal judge signaled that she would approve a settlement calling for wells fargo & co to pay $32 million to about 1,200 female brokers who claimed they were paid less than men and denied promotions because of their gender.
